Concerning methods which use 4 items a month
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Concerning methods which use 4 items a month
By Elf* on Tuesday, May 18, 2010 - 08:19 am:

Raising a monster such as my Joker with NO/ML/NO/ML its while life is causing me problems for maxing
out its life. It keeps entering stages a few weeks off as it easily slips into soft or fond and begins
to fail and cheat more, also making controlling its nature difficult. As I haven't found it anywhere
else, can I ask which week is the best to slip in a smoked snake if possible, and how often it can be
done?

By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, May 18, 2010 - 06:10 pm:

I usually just have a rest week tossed in for safety's sake about once a year. That's the week where I feed the extraordinary items.

By VashTheStampede on Wednesday, July 7, 2010 - 11:52 pm:

I usually do a 2-month training exercise, which ends up being like

NO/NO/ML/ML + NO/NO/ML/__

He rests on the third week of the second month, freeing up his item slot. Though, I also find myself changing up the first month a bit, doing some LDs towards the end of the month so I can fit in a Smoked Snake, since I REALLY like giving my Monster a Magic Banana in the 2nd month 4th week spot.

By big jay on Thursday, July 8, 2010 - 09:24 pm:

I forget where i got this idea from a while back but i trained my monsters on the last two weeks of the month... (sorta like my own little mix to DP's method) i trained... NO/MB/Tab/NO/ML/Tab and my training method was like LD/HD/LD/HD... i kno ur prolly asking why this is even relevant, im just suggesting that maybe you should think outside the box. with the method mentioned above you wont need that extra ML and can use that day to give the extra items needed (in this case magic bananas). sorry if this didnt help, i tried :)
